name: places/ChIJiXavIgtZwokRlsXYDleWKDc
adrFormatAddress: 369 1st Ave., New York, NY 10010-6504, USA

originalText.text:
I became a Client in 2021 when my wife was coming home from the hospital after learning she had lupus and another autoimmune disease.   He was the only pharmacist with her prescriptions in stock.  Since then I have discovered why Sam is the only pharmacist I will ever go to.   Aside from his professional, polite manner, Sam has an unparalleled knowledge of illness, disease and pharmacology.   I trust very few people , Sam is one of them.   He will actually take the time to listen to his patients questions and answer each and every one with a genuine understanding and concern.  He also sells other products at or below any chain pharmacy.   He loves his family and he treats his customers with care and respect.    Walk into any well-known chain pharmacy and you will NEVER find anyone like Sam.

Sam Wolf, local customer since 2021

originalText.text: I'm in the neighborhood fairly regularly, so years ago was happy to find excellent over-the-counter selection,  great service, and good prices. Also, communicative, considerate and trustworthy. Also, I shop here to support it whenever possible, as it's a  privately owned, traditional shop/keeper situation! I want to help resist the conglommerate and often incompetent, corrupt, mechanized robotic chain mega-store "pharmacies"...plus, I've never asked Sam a question he did know and share the answer w/me!

originalText.text: Go here once, meet Sam, understand what real pharmacy service looks like, and you will never, ever return to Duane Reade or CVS again.

text.text: Go here once, meet Sam, understand what real pharmacy service looks like, and you will never, ever return to Duane Reade or CVS again.

originalText.text: Sam is the best pharmacist in the city! What Rite Way Drugs lacks in flashy and "familiar" chain pharmacy branding..  is more than made up with actual familiarity. Sam is smart, kind and always willing to help. On top of that, the prices are very competitive too. I can pick up household staples, toiletries, and supplies along with my prescription without feeling gouged. 100% recommend Sam and Rite Way Drugs to anyone.

originalText.text: I’ve found the BEST service in this pharmacy. Sam is beyond amazing. He cares about each of the customers, remembers specifics details and is incredibly professional. Sometimes I have to wait a little bit in line but is so worth it that I don’t care.
